resources.string: How the app works: To view ingredients visit My Food tab. Visit Search Ingredient to add ingredients to your kitchen. To find a recipe, visit Search Recipes. To view favorite recipes visit Favorite Recipes tab.
This app was created to help people avoid wasting food and those who are passionate about cooking! As college students, we wanted to make cooking easy and manageable. Hope you enjoy!
App created by: Jonathan Mason, Emily Balboni and Amber Kusma
